name: Elementary Plugin Framework for Java
short_description: The Elementary Plugin Framework for Java (EPF4J) is a collection of classes that allow the integration of a simple yet functional plugin framework to applications. The design goals were simplicity, ease of use, and low cost/effort of integration.
